thread.title: Disney’s villainesses are setting temperatures high in new pin-up avatar
thread.title_full: Disney’s villainesses are setting temperatures high in new pin-up avatar

author: Deccan
title: Disney’s villainesses are setting temperatures high in new pin-up avatar
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 12, 2015, 18.10 pm The Evil Queen stepmother of Disney's Snow White. (Picture Courtesy: Facebook) You probably won’t see Disney’s female villain characters the same way again after seeing Andrew Tarusov’s new art project. The Los Angeles based illustrator has re-drawn the most popular female villains from Disney animation classics by giving them a decidedly naughtier makeover.
All the big bad girls – right from The Evil Queen, Maleficent, Cruella De Ville and even Ursula are given a racy pin-up girl look that will surely make you reconsider your earlier perception of the ladies from the dark side.
Check out these pictures and get bedazzled by these beastly beauties:
Maleficent
(Picture Courtesy: Facebook)
Lady Tremain
(Picture Courtesy: Facebook)
Madam Mim
(Picture Courtesy: Facebook)
Mother Gothel
(Picture Courtesy: Facebook)
Queen of Hearts
(Picture Courtesy: Facebook)
Cruella De Ville
(Picture Courtesy: Facebook)
Ursula
(Picture Courtesy: Facebook)
Madame Medusa
(Picture Courtesy: Facebook)
